name: set-dotnetcore-assembly-version
description: Patches all discovered .NET Core .csproj files with the supplied build number
helpMarkDown: This task should be sequenced directly after sources have been downloaded to ensure proper inclusion in build/release
author: IowaComputerGurus, Inc.

inputs.name: sourceDirectory
inputs.label: Source Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The directory to traverse looking for project files

inputs.name: solutionSearchPattern
inputs.label: Solution Search Pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: The search pattern to identity project files for patching.  By default excludes test projects using the tests suffix convention.

inputs.name: assemblyVersion
inputs.label: Assembly Version #
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version number to set on the assembly.    Must be in the format #.#.# or #.#.#.#

messages.InvalidVersion: Supplied version number %s does not match format of #.#.# or #.#.#.#
messages.UnableToFindVersion: Unable to find required version definition in file %s
